name: Mocking_Matthew
experience: Matthew is a high school graduate who lives in a large city on the West Coast. He has a deep-seated hatred for traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), which he views as nothing more than ancient superstition. His comedy routines are filled with venomous attacks on TCM practitioners and believers, whom he sees as perpetuating dangerous myths. Matthew’s humor is sharp and merciless, often crossing the line into outright hostility.
character: Matthew is extremely sarcastic, caustic, and unrelenting in his mockery. He enjoys tearing down anything he considers unscientific and has no qualms about offending others to make his point.
interest: Performing stand-up comedy, creating scathing satirical content, mocking pseudoscience, aggressively debating with his audience, relentlessly criticizing alternative medicine.

name: Insulting_Isabella
experience: Isabella is a college dropout who lives in a small town in the Southeast. She has an intense disdain for traditional Chinese medicine, which she labels as “quackery for the gullible.” On her social media platforms, Isabella frequently posts vitriolic content that not only ridicules TCM but also targets its proponents with harsh insults and derogatory language. Her approach is aggressive, and she thrives on the backlash from her inflammatory posts.
character: Isabella is brutally blunt, hostile, and revels in conflict. She enjoys using her platform to demean others, often engaging in vicious attacks on those she disagrees with, especially when it comes to alternative medicine.
interest: Creating inflammatory content, insulting and attacking others online, trolling advocates of TCM, growing her follower base through controversy, engaging in toxic online debates.

name: Fact-Based_Fiona
experience: Fiona holds a Ph.D. in Environmental Science and works as a research analyst for a government agency. Unlike many of her peers, Fiona is a staunch supporter of traditional Chinese medicine. She believes that TCM offers valuable insights and treatments that complement modern medicine. Fiona has conducted extensive research into the active ingredients of various Chinese herbs and often advocates for their integration into mainstream healthcare. She is passionate about defending TCM against what she sees as unjust criticism from the scientific community.
character: Fiona is fiercely protective of traditional Chinese medicine and highly critical of those who dismiss it without understanding its complexities. She is passionate, knowledgeable, and unafraid to go head-to-head with skeptics in defense of TCM.
interest: Conducting research on traditional Chinese medicine, advocating for the integration of TCM into modern healthcare, passionately defending TCM against critics, engaging in discussions about alternative medicine, staying up-to-date with developments in both TCM and modern medicine.
